languages.text: Владайм хочет устроить западню, чтобы выманить Инцендию Чорда с ее трона и покончить с ней. После того, как Лорд-капитан завершит подготовку к битве, е{mf|му|й} нужно будет сообщить Наместнику о готовности и отправить Инцендии через своих агентов информацию-приманку.

traits.locale_text: Владайм хочет устроить западню, чтобы застать Инцендию врасплох и покончить с ней раз и навсегда. Подготовьтесь к обороне, после чего сообщите Владайму, что вы готовы начинать.

languages.text: Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.
languages.original_text: Владайм хочет устроить западню, чтобы выманить Инцендию Чорда с ее трона и покончить с ней. После того, как Лорд-капитан завершит подготовку к битве, е{mf|му|й} нужно будет сообщить Наместнику о готовности и отправить Инцендии через своих агентов информацию-приманку.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

languages.text: Vladaym veut attirer Incendia Chorda loin de la protection que lui offre son trône pour lui tendre une embuscade et la tuer. Lorsque {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} sera {mf|prêt|prête} pour le combat, il lui faudra informer le suzerain que tout est en place. {mf|Il|Elle} pourra ensuite ordonner à ses agents de transmettre de fausses informations à Incendia pour l'attirer à l'endroit souhaité.
languages.original_text: Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym veut attirer Incendia Chorda loin de la protection que lui offre son trône pour lui tendre une embuscade et la tuer. Lorsque {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} sera {mf|prêt|prête} pour le combat, il lui faudra informer le suzerain que tout est en place. {mf|Il|Elle} pourra ensuite ordonner à ses agents de transmettre de fausses informations à Incendia pour l'attirer à l'endroit souhaité.

languages.text: 弗拉迪姆打算进行一场埋伏，引诱因森蒂娅·库尔达离开她的宝座，借着这个机会将她消灭。等行商浪人做好战斗准备之后，就可以通知弗拉迪姆总督一切准备就绪，之后通过{mf|他|她}的特工向因森蒂娅提供虚假情报，引诱因森蒂娅上钩。
languages.original_text: Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

traits.locale_text: 弗拉迪姆打算进行一场埋伏，引诱因森蒂娅·库尔达离开她的宝座，借着这个机会将她消灭。等行商浪人做好战斗准备之后，就可以通知弗拉迪姆总督一切准备就绪，之后通过{mf|他|她}的特工向因森蒂娅提供虚假情报，引诱因森蒂娅上钩。

languages.text: ヴラダイムは奇襲を仕掛けることを望んでいる。インセンディア・チョーダを王座の保護下からおびき出し、始末しようとしているのだ。ロード・キャプテンが戦闘の準備を整えたら、領主にすべての準備が整ったことを報告すべきだろう。その際に諜報員を使い、インセンディアが食らいつきそうな餌となる偽の情報を流すことができる。
languages.original_text: Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

traits.locale_text: ヴラダイムは奇襲を仕掛けることを望んでいる。インセンディア・チョーダを王座の保護下からおびき出し、始末しようとしているのだ。ロード・キャプテンが戦闘の準備を整えたら、領主にすべての準備が整ったことを報告すべきだろう。その際に諜報員を使い、インセンディアが食らいつきそうな餌となる偽の情報を流すことができる。

languages.text: Vladaym will einen Hinterhalt organisieren und Incendia Chorda von ihrem schützenden Thron weglocken, um sie auszuschalten. Wenn der Lord Captain sich für den Kampf gerüstet hat, sollte er den Lehnsherren informieren, dass alles bereit ist. Anschließend können die Agenten des Lord Captains Incendia mit falschen Informationen in die Irre führen.
languages.original_text: Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym will einen Hinterhalt organisieren und Incendia Chorda von ihrem schützenden Thron weglocken, um sie auszuschalten. Wenn der Lord Captain sich für den Kampf gerüstet hat, sollte er den Lehnsherren informieren, dass alles bereit ist. Anschließend können die Agenten des Lord Captains Incendia mit falschen Informationen in die Irre führen.

languages.text: Vladaym quiere preparar una emboscada y alejar a Incendia Chorda de la protección de su trono para librarse de ella. Cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán esté list{mf|o|a} para la batalla, debería informar al Señor de que todo está dispuesto y así hacer que sus agentes atraigan a Incendia con información falsa a modo de cebo.
languages.original_text: Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym quiere preparar una emboscada y alejar a Incendia Chorda de la protección de su trono para librarse de ella. Cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán esté list{mf|o|a} para la batalla, debería informar al Señor de que todo está dispuesto y así hacer que sus agentes atraigan a Incendia con información falsa a modo de cebo.

languages.text: Vladaym, tuzak kurup İncendia Chorda'yı tahtının koruyan kollarından çekerek ortadan kaldırmayı planlıyor. Lord Kaptan, savaşa hazır olduğunda gerekli işlemlerin yapıldığını Emîr'e haber vermeli. Ardından ajanlarını kullanarak İncendia'ya yem gönderip yanlış bilgilerle doldurulmasını sağlamalı.
languages.original_text: Vladaym wants to set up an ambush and lure Incendia Chorda from under the protection of her throne so she can be dealt with. Once the Lord Captain is prepared for battle, {mf|he|she} should inform the Liege that everything is ready, then {mf|he|she} can use {mf|his|her} agents to feed Incendia misinformation that will serve as bait.
